overview: Platform diving is Ariâ€™s great passion.The outdoor swimming pool is his refuge from a bleak day-to-day life and from his jaded mother who spends the majority of her time watching superficial infomercials on TV. When Ari wants to show his worth to a youth gang, he has to face one of his biggest fears: the 10m-tower. Maybe the Olympic champion Dmitri Sautin can help?
tagline: If you will it, it is no dream.
title: It is no Dream
